HTTPHeadersSec-Fetch-User.summary: The Sec-Fetch-User Fetch metadata request header is only sent for requests initiated by user activation, and its value will always be ?1.

remarks.para: A server can use this header to identify whether a navigation request from a document, iframe, etc., was originated by the user.

-Related headers-Sec-Fetch-Dest
-Sec-Fetch-Mode
-Sec-Fetch-Site
-Protect your resources from web attacks with Fetch Metadata (web.dev)
-Fetch Metadata Request Headers playground (secmetadata.appspot.com)
